title: Geometric Caps - I'm stumped!
content:
Does anyone have any ideas on this? I can't find a decent match...

Many thanks, Simon

comments.content: Any more words available in this setting?
Judging by the strange point of the V, I think that this could be a lighter weight with a stroke added.
